sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import './Header.scss' import SideBar from '../SideBar/SideBar' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' function Header(props) { const [isOpenSide, setIsOpenSide] = useState(false) function disableScrolling() { var x = window.scrollX var y = window.scrollY window.onscroll=function() {window.scrollTo(x, y);} } function enableScrolling() { window.onscroll = function(){} } const showSideBar = () => { setIsOpenSide(!isOpenSide) } document.body.style.overflow = isOpenSide ? disableScrolling : enableScrolling return (
) } export default Header
